org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery
Class AeXQueryTypeMapper

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery.AeXQueryTypeMapper
public class AeXQueryTypeMapper
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to convert Saxon AtomicValue instances to Jave/Ae objects.

          The map of Saxon types to specific convert methods.

public static boolean canConvert(net.sf.saxon.value.AtomicValue aValue)
Returns true if this type mapper has a mapping for the given AtomicValue.

Parameters:

convert

public static java.lang.Object convert(net.sf.saxon.value.AtomicValue aValue)
Converts a Saxon atomic value to a Java object. Note that users of this class should call canConvert prior to calling convert. If canConvert returns false, then convert should not be called (otherwise it will throw an IllegalArgumentException).

Parameters:
aValue -
